dict.string: Gain 10% of all damage done as Life.
Increases the chance of finding a health globe by 25% and you gain 100% additional health from health globes.
Critical hit chance increased by 5%. Critical hit damage increased by 50%. Many skills and runestone effects rely on critical hits to trigger their effects.

Gain a bonus based on the weapon type of your main hand weapon:
Swords/Daggers: 10% increased damage Maces/Axes: 5% chance to critical hit Polearms/Spears: 10% attack speed Mighty Weapons: 1 Fury per hit

The duration of your shouts is doubled. While benefiting from War Cry or Battle Rage you regenerate 60% of your total Life per minute.
Your shouts are: Battle Rage Threatning Shout War Cry
You inflict an additional 20% damage while at maximum Fury.
Increases Fury generation by 10% and maximum Fury is increased by 20. Fury is used to fuel your most powerful attacks.
Reduces all non-physical damage by 20%. Whenever you take damage from a ranged or elemental attack you gain 3 Fury.
Increases armor by 100%. Thorns damage dealt increased by 100%.

Increases the damage of Ancient Spear and Weapon Throw by 100%. In addition, killing an enemy with Ancient Spear automatically resets the cooldown and killing an enemy with Weapon Throw returns 20 Fury.
While below 20% Life, all skills cost no Fury and all damage taken is reduced by 50%.
As long as there are 5 enemies within 8 yards, all of your damage is increased by 30%.
The duration of control impairing effects on you are reduced by 20%. In addition, whenever you become stunned, feared or charmed you recover 15% of your maximum Life.
The cooldown on your Earthquake, Call of the Ancients and Wrath of the Berserker skills is reduced by 30 seconds.
You no longer degenerate Fury. Instead, you gain 1 Fury every 2 seconds.
Cause a shockwave that inflicts 80% weapon damage to enemies in a 26 yard line behind the targeted enemy.
Add 7 reverberation that causes 18% weapon damage per strike.
Each attack grants a 10% damage boost for 5 seconds. This effect stacks up to 8 times.
Gives each hit a 20% chance to stun the target for 3.5 seconds.
Brutally smash an enemy for 145% weapon damage with a 20% chance to knock the enemy back.
Whenever you kill an enemy with Hammer of the Ancients every other nearby enemy has a 65% chance to be stunned for 3 seconds.
Strike a smaller area for 396% weapon damage.
Critical hits have a 55% chance to cause enemies to drop treasure or health globes.
Modifies the strike to create a shockwave that deals 172% weapon damage to all enemies in front of you.
Create a tremor at the point of impact that slows the movement speed of enemies by 40% and deals an additional 117% weapon damage over 2 seconds.
Call forth a massive hammer to smash enemies directly in front of you for 180% weapon damage. Hammer of the Ancients has a 15% increased chance to critical hit.
Enemies are severely demoralized. Each enemy has a 28% chance to flee for 2 - 9 seconds.
Affected enemies are also taunted to attack you for 9 seconds.
Affected enemies also have their attack speed reduced by 55%.
Affected enemies also have their movement speed reduced by 62%.
Enemies are badly shaken and have a 22% chance to drop additional treasure.
Shout with great ferocity, reducing damage done by enemies within 25 yards by 50% for 15 seconds.
While under the effects of Battle Rage, critical hits cause an explosion of blood dealing 55% weapon damage to all nearby enemies.
Critical hits increase the duration of the Battle Rage effect by 4.0 seconds.
Critical hits have a 20% chance to cause enemies to drop additional treasure or health globes.
Enter a rage which increases damage by 30% and critical hit chance by 4% for 30 seconds.
Enemies slain by this attack have a 100% chance to explode, causing 150% physical damage to all other enemies within 19 yards.
Increases damage to 260% weapon damage to the targeted enemy and 130% weapon damage to others in the arc.
Generate 1 Fury per enemy hit, up to 7 additional Fury total.
Draw enemies in from 26 yards away before the strike lands.
On critical hits, knock enemies back 22 yards and inflict 175% weapon damage to enemies where they land. Enemies knock each other back up to 8 times.
Swing in a wide arc to deal 120% weapon damage to the targeted enemy and 60% weapon damage to any other enemies caught in the swing.
While Ignore Pain is active, gain 40% of all damage dealt as Life.
Reflects 65% of ignored damage back at the enemy.
Knocks back all enemies within 28 yards when triggered and reduces cooldown time to 25 seconds. Also deals 50% weapon damage on affected enemies.
Extend the effect to nearby allies, reducing damage taken by 65% for 5.0 seconds.
Reduces all damage taken by 65% for 5 seconds.
Land with such force that enemies suffer a 100% chance to become stunned for 3 seconds.
Shockwaves burst forth from the ground at the destination and knock enemies toward you from 45.0 yards away.
Gain 700% additional armor for 4 seconds after landing.
Send enemies hurtling 6 yards into other nearby enemies who suffer 80% weapon damage and are pushed back in a chain up to 2 times.
Jump into the air with such great force that enemies within 7.5 yards of the origin of the jump take 160% weapon damage.
Leap into the air, dealing 40% weapon damage to all enemies within 8 yards of your destination. Only generates Fury if you hit an enemy.
Aim for the head, causing your target to be confused and attack other enemies for 9 seconds.
Increase thrown weapon damage to 462% weapon damage.
Expend all remaining Fury to throw a fallen foe which inflicts an additional 9% weapon damage for each point of Fury expended to all enemies within 22 yards of the target.
Angle the weapon to ricochet and hit up to 8 targets within 20 yards of each other.
Hurl a hammer with a 33% chance to stun the target for 3 seconds.
Hurl a throwing weapon at an enemy for 210% weapon damage and slowing the movement of the enemy by 70% for 4 seconds.
Enemies in the area are slowed for 10 - 12 seconds after they recover from being stunned.
Increase Fury gained to 43 Fury per stomp.
Increase the area of effect to 33 yards. Enemies are pulled closer before the strike lands.
Enemies are knocked back 15 yards and inflict 175% weapon damage where they land.
Shake the ground to inflict 30% weapon damage to all enemies within 12 yards and stun them for 3 seconds. Only generates Fury if you hit an enemy.
Enemies killed while bleeding cause all enemies within 10 yards to begin bleeding for 100% weapon damage.
Increases damage to 123% weapon damage every second for 3 seconds.
Gain 40% of the damage done by Rend as Life.
Increases the range to deal 96% weapon damage every second for 3 seconds to all enemies within 14 yards.
Perform a vicious strike to all enemies within 9 yards, dealing 60% weapon damage every second for 3 seconds.
Killing a creature with Frenzy heals you for 25% Life over 6 seconds.
Each Frenzy effect also increases your damage by 24%.
Adds a 35% chance to call down a bolt of lightning from above, stunning your target for 3 seconds.
Each strike has a 55% chance to throw a piercing axe at a nearby enemy that deals 100% weapon damage to all enemies in its path.
While under the effects of Frenzy you gain 22% increased movement speed.
Swing for 80% weapon damage. Each swing increases attack speed of Frenzy by 15% for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times for a total bonus of 75% attack speed.
After using Revenge, your critical strike chance is increased by 27% for 10 seconds.
Gain 7 Fury each time Revenge is used and improve Life gained from each enemy hit to 12.0%.
Increases the chance Revenge will become active for use to 31% each time you are hit by an attack.
Knocks enemies back 30 yards when Revenge is used. Revenge has a 10% chance to become active for a short time each time you are hit by an attack.
Inflict 150% weapon damage to all enemies within 8 yards and gain 5.0% Life for each enemy hit.
Increases maximum Life by 50% and regenerates 479 Life per second while affected by War Cry.
Increases the Fury generated to 51 when used.
War Cry also grants 27% dodge bonus.
All of your resistances are increased by 80% while affected by War Cry.
Unleash a rallying cry to increase the armor of you and all allies within 30 yards by 100% for 60 seconds.
Cooldown is reduced by 1 second for every target hit. This effect can reduce the cooldown by up to 8 seconds.
Increase damage at the destination to 300% weapon damage.
Generate 8 Fury for each target hit while charging.
Regain 5% of your maximum Life for each target hit by Furious Charge.
Any targets who are critically hit by Furious Charge will be stunned for 5.0 seconds.
Rush forward knocking back enemies and inflicting 60% weapon damage to enemies at the destination and 30% damage to enemies along the path of the charge. Only generates Fury if you hit an enemy.
Reflect 45% of incoming melee damage for 17 seconds after Overpower is activated.
Whenever used, your chance to critical hit is increased by 22% for 6.0 seconds.
Overpower generates 7 Fury for every enemy hit.
Throw up to 9 axes at nearby enemies which inflict 240% weapon damage each.

Heal 18% of your maximum Life whenever Overpower is used.
Overpower becomes available whenever you make a critical hit against an enemy.
Press the advantage of a powerful attack to overwhelm the enemy for 150% weapon damage to all targets within 9 yards.
Focus the seismic shockwaves along a narrow path to inflict 441% weapon damage to targets along a 42 yard path.
Increase damage to 366% weapon damage and increases the knockback by 225%.
The ground continues to shudder after the intitial strike, damaging enemies in the area for 160% weapon damage.
Adds a 100% chance of stunning enemies for 3 seconds.
Slam the ground to cause a wave of destruction that deals 215% weapon damage and knockback to targets in a 45 yard arc.
Project secondary tremors up to 12 yards ahead of you that inflict 260% weapon damage.
Secondary tremors knock enemies back and inflict 260% weapon damage.
Reduce Fury cost to 40 Fury and the cooldown to 50 seconds.
Secondary tremors follow your movement and inflict 260% weapon damage.
Creates an icy patch causing Eathquake's damage to turn cold and slow the movement of enemies by 62%.
Shake the ground violently dealing 240% weapon damage followed by an additional 150% weapon damage per second for 8 seconds to all enemies within 15 yards.
Enemies hit with Ancient Spear will be tossed in the opposite direction and damage is increased to 143% weapon damage.
Pierce through up to 8 enemies in a straight line and drag them all back.
Throw 8 spears. Each spear will pull back the enemy that it hits.
Gain Life equal to 700% of the damage inflicted.
Throw a spear up to 45 yards to pull an enemy back to you, slowing target's movement by 50% and dealing 55% weapon damage.
Slams through enemies, knocking them back and inflicting 200% weapon damage.
Increases the movement speed bonus to 110% for 20 seconds.
Increase the movement speed of allies within 30 yards by 40% for 6 seconds.
Increase dodge chance by 22% while sprinting.
Tornadoes rage in the wake of the Sprint, each one inflicting 200% weapon damage.
Increase movement speed by 40% for 6 seconds.
Talic gains the ability Leap Attack which deals 360% of your weapon damage to enemies in the area of the leap.
Korlic gains the ability Furious Charge which deals 280% of your weapon damage to all enemies in a line.
The Ancients inflict 275% weapon damage with each attack and have 175% additional armor.
Madawc gains the ability Seismic Slam which deals 205% of your weapon damage to enemies in an arc.

Summon the ancient Barbarians Talic, Korlic, and Madawc to inflict 100% weapon damage with each attack as they join the battle for 15 seconds.
Talic wields a sword and shield and uses the Whirlwind skill. Korlic wields a massive polearm and uses the Cleave skill. Madawc dual-wields axes and uses the Weapon Throw skill.
Critical strikes restore 7% of your maximum Life.
Turns Whirlwind into a torrent of magma that inflicts 84% weapon damage every 0.40 seconds.
Reduce the cost of Whirlwind to 4.5 Fury per second.
Generate harsh tornadoes that inflict 90% weapon damage to enemies in their path.
Increase the movement speed of Whirlwind by 85%.
Deliver multiple attacks to everything in your path for 44% weapon damage every 0.40 seconds.
Killing an enemy while Wrath of the Berserker is active causes them to explode dealing 450% weapon damage to all enemies within 15 yards.
While active your damage is also increased by 75%.
Every 9 Fury gained while Wrath of the Berserker is active adds 1 second to the duration of the effect.
Activating Wrath of the Berserker knocks back all enemies within 12 yards and deals 550% weapon damage to them.
Increase the bonus dodge chance granted to 60%.

Enter a berserker rage which raises several attributes for 15 seconds.
Critical Hit: 10% Attack Speed: 45% Dodge Chance: 20% Movement Speed: 20%
As long as you have not taken damage in the last 5 seconds you gain 2% of your maximum health per second.
Every 10 seconds your next normal attack will immobilize your target for 3 seconds.
Gain 10 Hatred, 1 Discipline, and increases your maximum Hatred by 50 for 10 seconds whenever you are healed by a health globe.
As long as there are no enemies within 10 yards, all damage is increased by 10%.
Damage against slowed enemies increased by 20%.
Increases the damage of your basic attacks by 100%. Your basic attacks restore 15 Hatred.
Whenever you are at full Hatred, movement speed is increased by 10%.
Gain bonuses based on weapon held: Bow: +10% increased damage Bonus with crossbows: +100% critical damage Bonus with hand xbows: +5% chance to critical hit
Reduces the Discipline cost of all skills by 20%. Discipline is used to fuel many of your tactical and defensive skills.
The duration of your Caltrops, Marked for Death, Spike Trap and Sentry abilities are increased by 100%.
Reduces the Hatred cost of your Grenades and Cluster Arrow abilities by 15. Upon death, you drop a giant grenade that explodes for 213 - 320 fire damage.
Gain a 3% chance to critical hit every second. This bonus is reset 1 second after you successfully critical hit.
Damage from rockets increased by 100%. Rockets are fired from certain socketed skill effects.
Critical hits deal an additional 500% weapon damage.
The shot will pierce through all enemies in a straight line for 358% weapon damage.
Every shot releases a shockwave of energy centered on you dealing 120% weapon damage to all enemies within 10 yards.
Shots knock the target back and stun them for 3.50 seconds.
Fire an explosive shell that deals an additional 275% weapon damage over 2 seconds.
Fire a massive shot to impale a target for 325% weapon damage.
Become empowered while standing in the area of effect, gaining an additional 11% chance to critical hit with all attacks.
Enemies in the area also take 110% weapon damage per second.
When the trap is sprung, all enemies in the area are immobilized for 6 seconds.
Lay a trap of caltrops on the ground that activates when an enemy approaches. Once sprung, the caltrops slow the movement of enemies within 12 yards by 65%. This trap lasts 12 seconds.
Successful crits cause a burst of bone to explode from the target dealing 240% of weapon damage to enemies in that area.
Light the arrow on fire, dealing 160% additional weapon damage as Fire damage over 5 seconds.
Increase the chance for the arrow to pierce to 95%.
If the arrow successfully pierces the first target, the arrow splits into 8 arrows.
Each consecutive pierce increases the damage of the arrow by 140%.
Fire a magically imbued arrow that seeks out targets for 115% weapon damage and has a 60% chance to pierce through targets.
Increase the distance of the backflip to 36 yards.
Fire exploding bullets that also deal 60% weapon damage to all enemies within 8.5 yards of the primary target.
Shoot for 115% of weapon damage as lightning. Reduces the Discipline cost of the backflip component down to 0.
Fire a spread of bullets that hit up to 9 targets for 46% weapon damage each.
Shoot for 115% of weapon damage as Poison damage. Whenever a backflip is triggered, leave a poison bomb behind that explodes for 510% of weapon damage as poison in a 18 yard radius after 0.4 seconds.
Shoot for 115% of weapon damage. If an enemy is at close range, you will also backflip away 15 yards.
Augments the bola to deal 264% weapon damage as Arcane to the target and an additional 198% weapon damage to all other targets within 7 yards, but increases the explosion delay to 2 seconds.
Increase the explosion radius to 14 yards.
After the bola explodes, you have a 30% chance to gain 8 Discipline.
Shoot 9 poison bolas that deal 25% weapon damage each. The bolas no longer explode for area damage to nearby targets.
When the bola explodes it deals 110% weapon damage as Lightning damage and has a 35% chance to stun the target for 3.0 seconds.

Shoot out an explosive bola that wraps itself around its target. After 1 second, the bola explodes dealing 110% weapon damage as Fire to the target and an additional 82% weapon damage as Fire damage to all other targets within 7 yards.
Slows the movement of affected targets by 40% for 5.0 seconds.
Rapidly fire grenades instead of arrows that do 18% weapon damage to all enemies within a 10 yard radius.
Reduces the initial Hatred cost to 20.
Adds an additional 70% pierce chance to the projectiles fired.
While channeling Rapid Fire launch 7 homing missiles every second that deal 50% weapon damage each to nearby targets.
Rapidly fire at 6 times your normal attack speed dealing 35% weapon damage with every shot.
All enemies within 8 yards of your destination are knocked back and stunned for 4.5 seconds.
Ignite with fire dealing 80% weapon damage to everything along your path.
After using Vault, your next Vault within 5 seconds has its Discipline cost reduced by 80%
Increases your Vault distance to 70 yards.
As you travel, shoot arrows for 205% weapon damage at nearby targets.
Surround yourself in spinning Chakrams for 70 seconds, dealing 180% weapon damage per second to anybody nearby.
A second Chakram mirrors the first. Each Chakram deals 210% weapon damage.
The Chakram spirals out from the targeted location dealing 180% weapon damage as Arcane to enemies along the path.
The Chakram path turns into a loop, dealing 240% weapon damage as Lightning to enemies along the path.
The Chakram follows a slow curve, dealing 180% weapon damage as Poison to enemies along the path.
Fire a swirling Chakram that does 150% weapon damage to enemies along its path.
Gain 22% of the damage dealt as Life.
Increase the movement slow duration to 9 seconds.
Strike with electrical chains that do an additional 64 damage over 2 seconds.
Release a sticky adhesive that deals 100% weapon damage and entangles up to 2 enemies, slowing their movement by 70% for 2 seconds.
Fire bolts of lightning that stun enemies for 3.5 seconds when they critically hit.
Turns into a frost arrow that explodes out conal damage from the back of the first target hit for 160% of weapon damage.
Shoot tentacles that deal 140% weapon damage and return 24% of damage dealt as Life for you.
Fire a lightning arrow that electrocutes nearby enemies as it passes by for 80% of weapon damage.
Grants a 34% chance to shoot a skull that will fear affected enemies for 8 - 9 seconds.
Shoot an elemental charged arrow that deals 120% weapon damage as Fire damage to all targets it passes through.
Hurl grenades that have a 70% chance to stun enemies for 2.5 seconds.
Toss poison gas grenades that explode for 75% weapon damage as Poison and leaves a cloud that deals an additional 40% of weapon damage per second for 3 seconds to enemies who stand in the area.
Throw a large cluster of mini-grenades that deal 35% weapon damage as Fire over an 8 yard radius.
Throw a single large grenade that deals 161% weapon damage as Fire damage and knocks enemies back.
Throw out three grenades that explode for 75% weapon damage as Fire each.
While active, gain 45% of all damage as Life.
While active, gain 7 Hatred per second.
While active, you have a 55% increased chance to dodge incoming attacks.
Draw in the power of the shadows, increasing attack speed by 50% for 10 seconds.
Instead of throwing the knives immediately, the knives will release automatically dealing 336% weapon damage to all enemies if you are struck in the next 20 seconds.
Increase the radius to deal 336% weapon damage to all enemies within 18 yards.
Increase the slow amount to 79% for 4 seconds.
Throw long-range knives that deal 85% weapon damage to 8 additional targets.
Imbue your knives with a 20% chance to stun enemies for 3.5 seconds.
Throw knives out in a spiral around you, doing 210% weapon damage to all enemies within 10 yards of you. Your knives will also slow the movement of enemies by 65% for 4 seconds.
Summons ferrets instead of a raven. The ferrets collect gold for you and increase gold found on monsters by 40%.
Summons a spider instead of a raven. The spiders's attacks also slows the movement of targets by 50% for 9 - 11 seconds.
Summons a bat instead of a raven. The bat grants you 4.0 Hatred per second.
Summon a boar instead of a raven. The boar strikes multiple enemies with every swing for 43 - 75 damage.
Summon a powerful but temporary wolf ally rather than a long-term raven companion. The wolf will fight with you for 55 seconds and attacks enemies for 50 - 82 damage.
Summon a raven companion. Your raven companion will periodically peck at enemies for 21 - 28 damage.
When the trap is triggered, rather than exploding, it releases a pulse of lightning that will bounce to up to 10 enemies for 150% weapon damage as Lightning.
Increases the arming time to 1.9 seconds but increases damage to 390% weapon damage.
A single cast of Spike Trap lays all 3 traps at once and increases the damage of the traps to 270% weapon damage.
Increase the maximum number of traps that can be out simultaneously to 10.
Plant an explosive on an enemy target rather than on the ground. If the target dies within 30 seconds, the trap explodes dealing 270% weapon damage to all enemies within 8 yards.

Lay a trap that arms after 1.2 seconds and triggers when an enemy approaches. The trap does 150% weapon damage to all enemies within 8 yards.
You can have a maximum of 3 Spike Traps active at one time.
Every enemy hit grants 1 Discipline. Each volley can gain up to 9 Discipline in this way.
Increases the damage done to 330% weapon damage.
Everytime you fire, generate a shock pulse that damages all nearby enemies for 110% weapon damage.
Every use also fires 10 rockets at nearby enemies that deal 150% weapon damage each.
Fire a massive volley of arrows dealing 150% weapon damage to all enemies in the area.
Leave behind a cloud of gas that deals 92 physical damage per second to enemies in the area for 5 seconds.
Reduce the skill cost to 11.0 Discipline.
Increase the duration of the effect to 4.00 seconds.
While invisible you also gain 45 Hatred per second.
Vanish behind a wall of smoke, becoming momentarily invisible for 2 seconds.
Throw out knives rather than arrows that do an extra 400% more weapon damage on successful critical hits.
Throw out bouncy grenades rather than arrows that explode for 60% weapon damage to targets within 9 yards.
Movement speed increased to 103% of normal running speed while strafing.
Increase your attack speed to 3 of your normal attack speed.
In addition to regular firing, fire off homing rockets that hit for 120% of weapon damage.
Shoot at 200% your normal attack speed at random nearby enemies while moving at 65% of normal movement speed. Every shot deals 50% weapon damage.
The turret also creates a shield that reduces damage taken by allies by 32%.
Create a tether between you and the sentry that does 240% of weapon damage every second to every enemy it touches.
Heals nearby allies for 8% of their maximum Life per second.
Increases duration of the turret to 48 seconds.
The turret will also fire homing rockets every 1.5 seconds aimed at random nearby targets for 240% weapon damage.
Drop a turret on the ground. The turret begins firing at nearby enemies for 40% of weapon damage. Lasts 20 seconds.
10% of damage done to the marked target heals the attacker.
An additional 40% of damage done to the target is also divided among all enemies within 20 yards.
Attacks by the Demon Hunter against the Marked target have a 40% chance to generate 35 Hatred. This effect cannot occur more than once every 1 second.
When the target is killed the ability spreads to 8 other nearby targets. This effect can chain repeatedly.
Mark an area on the ground 15 yards wide for 22 seconds. Enemies in the area take 20% additional damage.
Marks an enemy. The marked enemy will take 20% additional damage for the next 30 seconds.
Grants a 55% chance that the cooldown will not be triggered when used.
Removes cooldown. Skill now costs 19 Discipline to cast but restores all Hatred instead of all Discipline.
Also restores 55% of your Life when used.
When activated, increases your maximum Discipline by 18 for 120 seconds.
Instead of replenishing Discipline immediately, you will gain 60 Discipline over 30 seconds.
Enemies hit by grenades have a 35% chance to be stunned for 2.5 seconds.
Increases the damage of the explosion at the impact location to 352%.
Instead of releasing grenades, the cluster releases Shadow energy that deals 220% weapon damage to nearby enemies. You will gain 51% of the damage done as Life.
Instead of releasing grenades, shoots up to 9 rockets at nearby enemies dealing 220% weapon damage each.
Launch the cluster through the air, dropping a series of bombs in a straight line that explode for 110% weapon damage each.
Fire a Cluster grenade that explodes for 160% weapon damage into a series of additional miniature bombs that explode for 80% weapon damage each.
Summon a wave of 14 Shadow Beasts to tear across the ground, knocking back enemies and dealing 126% weapon damage.
Summon 20 Shadow Beasts to drop bombs on nearby enemies, dealing 154% weapon damage each.
A group of 12 Shadow Beasts plummet from the sky at a targeted location dealing 126% weapon damage and stunning enemies for 2 seconds.
Launch a massive volley of guided arrows that rain down on enemies for the next 12 seconds for 56% weapon damage.
Summon a Shadow Beast that drops grenades from the sky for 20 seconds dealing 14% weapon damage.
Fire a massive volley of arrows around you. Arrows fall from the sky for 5 seconds dealing an average of 49% weapon damage per second.
Damage you deal reduces enemy damage by 10% for 2.5 seconds.
While dual-wielding, you gain a 10% chance to dodge incoming attacks. While using a two-handed weapon, all Spirit generation is increased by 20%.
Every point of Spirit spent heals you for 42.6 Life.
Duration of all Mantras increased by 120 seconds. While one of your Mantras is active you gain 1 Spirit every second.
Your Defense is increased by 25% of your Attack.
Increases maximum Spirit by 100. Spirit fuels your defensive and offensive abilities.
Your dodge chance is increased by an amount equal to 50% of your chance to critical hit.
While stunned, feared or charmed, all damage taken is reduced by 75%.
When receiving fatal damage, you are instead restored to 35% of maximum Life and 35% Spirit. This effect cannot occur more than once every 90 seconds.
Whenever you heal another player with an active skill, you and the other player deal 16% more damage for 10 seconds.
Your resistance to all elements is equal to your highest elemental resistance.
The cooldown on your Lashing Tail Kick, Seven-Sided Strike and Wave of Light abilities is removed, but their Spirit cost is increased by 50%.
Each hit with Fists of Thunder increases your Dodge chance by 2.5%. This effect stacks up to 8 times.

Each punch causes a shockwave that hits all enemies within 8 yards of your primary target for 105% weapon damage as Lightning damage. Also enables you to teleport a short distance during the ability's first strike.
Critical hits with this skill generate 7 Spirit.
The third strike creates chain lightning that can jump to up to 9 other nearby targets. Each lightning strike inflicts 80% weapon damage as Lightning damage.
Enemies attacked are charged with static for 10 seconds. Charged enemies take 130% weapon damage as Lightning damage when you attack other nearby enemies with Fists of Thunder.

Deal a series of extremely fast punches that deal 100% weapon damage as Lightning damage. Every third hit deals damage to all enemies in front of you. Each strike has a 15% chance to interrupt enemy attacks.
Increases the chance affected enemies will miss attacks to 65%.
For 24 seconds after using Blinding Flash, all of your attacks are infused to deal 17 - 34 additional Holy damage.
Increases the duration enemies are blinded to 12 seconds.
3 seconds after using Blinding Flash, a second flash of light will blind enemies within 20 yards for 2 seconds.
Blinded enemies have a 100% chance to attack each other.
Create a flash of light that blinds all enemies within 20 yards for 5 seconds. Blinded enemies have a 30% chance to miss with attacks and will not attack unless they are attacked first.

When you or an ally under the effect of Mantra of Evasion is reduced below 20% Life, a shield of protection forms around that target, reducing incoming damage by 80% for 10 seconds. Each target can be protected at most once every 120 seconds by this effect.
Successfully dodging an attack creates a burst of flame dealing 120% weapon damage as Fire damage to all nearby enemies.
Mantra of Evasion also grants an increase in run speed by 10%.
Mantra of Evasion also reduces the duration of all control imparing effects by 45%.
Mantra of Evasion also grants an increase in armor by 180%.

Recite a Mantra that grants you and all allies within 40 yards a 30% chance to dodge attacks. Lasts 120 seconds. Dodge chance is doubled in the first 3 seconds. This is a Mantra. You can only have one Mantra active at a time.
Instead of knocking enemies back, affected enemies are stunned for 3.0 seconds.
With a torrent of fire, strike all nearby enemies for 312% weapon damage as Fire damage and knock them back.
All enemies around you are knocked back 260% farther and slow their movement by 40% for 10 seconds.
Hurl a column of fire that pierces through enemies, causing 312% weapon damage as Fire damage to each enemy it strikes.
Smite all enemies within 5 yards of a target location for 312% weapon damage and slows their movement by 40% for 10 seconds.
Unleash a deadly roundhouse kick, knocking enemies back and dealing 130% weapon damage.
The third strike of Deadly Reach increases the armor of the monk by 80% for 10 seconds.
The third strike of Deadly Reach increases the damage of all attacks by 10% for 17 seconds. This effect can stack up to 3 times.
Critical hits with this skill generate 7 Spirit.
The second and third strike of the skill have an increased area of effect. Also increases skill damage to 212% of weapon damage.
The third strike is replaced with an attack that will hit up to 9 enemies within 15 yards for 125% weapon damage as Lightning damage.
Project lines of pure force over a short distance for 125% weapon damage. Every third hit extends out 25 yards.
Enemies hit by Breath of Heaven run in fear for 9 seconds, and take 14 Holy damage per second as they flee.
In addition to healing, Breath of Heaven also sears enemies for 57 - 91 Holy damage.
Gain 1 additional Spirit from each combo attack for 33 seconds after using Breath of Heaven.
Increases all damage done by 20% for 33 seconds after Breath of Heaven is used.
A blast of holy energy heals you and all allies within 12 yards for 4790 - 6387 Life.
Perform a flying kick that has a 50% chance to stun your target for 3.5 seconds.
Fly through the air head first, slowing the movement of all enemies along the path by 50% for 10 seconds.
The cost of Dashing Strike is reduced to 3 Spirit.
Increases movement speed by 55% for 3 seconds after using Dashing Strike to an enemy.
Receive a 30% increased chance to dodge for 12 seconds.
Dash quickly at the targeted enemy or location, dealing 50% weapon damage and rooting the target for 1 second.
If you die while the decoy is alive, you are resurrected at the decoy's location with 100% Life. The decoy no longer attracts enemies and the duration is increased to 26 seconds.
Increases damage of the explosion to 94 - 172 Holy damage.
When the decoy explodes it also heals all allies within 25 yards for 3726 - 4471 Life.
Spawn 3 decoys. Each decoy deals 31 - 56 Holy damage when it explodes.
Summons a stronger decoy for 13 seconds. The decoy can move and attack enemies for 85 - 149 damage per swing.
Create an illusion of pure holy energy that attracts enemies to itself and explodes after 5 seconds for 43 - 78 Holy damage.
Affected targets take 80% additional damage from all attacks for 9 seconds.
Critical hits with this skill generate 7 Spirit.
Crippling Wave's third attack range increases to 17 yards.
Enemies hit by Crippling Wave inflict 50% less damage for 9 seconds.

A series of large sweeping attacks that causes 100% weapon damage to all enemies in front of you. Every third hit damages all enemies around you and dazes them, slowing movement by 50% for 4.5 seconds.
An attacker that triggers Mantra of Retribution has a 30% chance to suffer a feedback blast, dealing 39 - 46 damage to itself and surrounding enemies.
Increase amount of damage reflected by the Mantra to 75%. The Mantra will now reflect ranged damage as well as melee damage.
Mantra of Retribution also restores 1 - 8 Spirit when reflecting damage done to you.
Mantra of Retribution also increases attack speed for you and all allies by 40%.
When Mantra of Retribution damages an attacker, the attacker has a 100% chance to be stunned for 2 seconds.

Recite a Mantra that causes you and all allies within 40 yards to reflect melee damage back at enemies, dealing Holy damage equal to 40% of the damage sustained. Lasts 120 seconds. This is a Mantra. You can only have one Mantra active at a time.
When Inner Sanctuary expires it becomes Sanctified Ground for 6 seconds, slowing the movement of all enemies on it by 60%.
Enemies within the area of effect of Inner Sanctuary when it is activated take 185 - 199 Holy damage.
You and all allies regenerate 1170.9 Life per second while inside the circle.
Increase the duration of Inner Sanctuary to 15 seconds.
You and all allies standing in the area of effect of Inner Sanctuary take 55% less damage from attacks.
Create a circle of protection on the ground for 8 seconds that cannot be passed by enemies.

The third strike causes the target to burn for 95% weapon damage as Fire damage every second for 3 seconds. If the target dies while burning it explodes causing all nearby enemies to burn for 100% weapon damage as Fire damage for 2 seconds. This effect can chain repeatedly.
Increases the duration of the bleed effect to 10 seconds.
If a target dies and explodes with the bleed on them, gain 7 Spirit for each enemy hit by the explosion.
The bleed effect hits up to 8 targets standing in front of you.
The first two strikes cause the enemy to take 10% additional damage for 5 seconds. This effect stacks up to 8 times on each target.

The first two strikes in the attack deal 100% weapon damage. The third strike causes the target to bleed for 65% of weapon damage per second for 3 seconds. If the target dies while bleeding, it explodes, dealing 40% of the target's maximum Life as physical damage to all other enemies nearby.
Mantra of Healing also increases all resistances by 50%.
Increases the Life regeneration granted by Mantra of Healing to 292.7 Life per second.
Mantra of Healing also grants you 2.0 Spirit per second.
When Mantra of Healing is activated a temporary shield is placed on you and your allies for 10 seconds. The shield will absorb up to 40% of each person's maximum Life in damage.
Mantra of Healing also increases Vitality by 45%.

Recite a Mantra that causes you and all allies within 40 yards to gain increased Life regeneration by 106.4 Life per second. Lasts 120 seconds. Life regeneration is doubled in the first 3 seconds. This is a Mantra. You can only have one Mantra active at a time.
Increases the potency of the hobbling effect, slowing enemy movement by 71.00%.
Affected enemies also have their damage reduced by 60% for the duration of the effect.
Reduces cost to 5 Spirit per second.
Increases the movement speed of Tempest Rush to 140% of normal.
Damage taken while running is reduced by 65%.
Run directly through your enemies knocking them back and hobbling them, slowing their movement by 50% for 3 seconds. Also deals 75% of weapon damage per second while running.
Increases the duration of the vortex buff to 12 seconds.
Intensify the vortex, increasing the damage per stack to 44% weapon damage per second. This increases the damage with 3 stacks to 132% weapon damage per second.
As long as your vortex is at the maximum stack count, you gain 2.4 Spirit per second.
Increases the radius of the vortex to 14 yards and the damage per stack to 36% weapon damage per second as Fire damage. This increases the damage with 3 stacks to 108% weapon damage per second.

While your vortex is at the maximum stack count, every third hit spawns a lightning tornado that periodically shocks nearby enemies for 66% weapon damage as Lightning damage. Each spawned lightning tornado lasts 3 seconds.

Strike a target for 100% weapon damage. Every third hit creates a vortex of air that surrounds you. The vortex of air lasts 5 seconds and deals 20% weapon damage per second to all enemies within 10 yards. This vortex effect can stack up to 3 times for a total of 60% weapon damage per second to nearby enemies.
90% of the damage absorbed by Serenity is unleashed as an explosion when Serenity expires, dealing up to 146 Holy damage to enemies within 20 yards.
Heal yourself for 6387 - 8409 Life when Serenity is activated.
Extends the protective shield and immunity to control impairing effects to allies within 45 yards for 3 seconds.
While Serenity is active, 100% of all projectiles and melee attacks are reflected back at the attacker.
Increases the duration of Serenity to 6.5 seconds.
You are enveloped in a protective shield that intercepts all incoming damage for 3 seconds and grants immunity to all control impairing effects.
The third strike generates a wave of wind that deals 149 - 163 physical damage to enemies directly ahead of you.
Affected targets will take an additional 35 Holy damage per second for 5 seconds. Also enables the first hit to dash a short distance.
Every activation of the skill has a 15% chance to generate 7 additional Spirit.
Increase the number of hits in the second strike from 8 to 22 hits.
Critical hits increase your attack speed by 22% and movement speed by 11%. This effect lasts for 5 seconds and can stack up to 3 times.
A rapid series of punches strikes enemies for 135% weapon damage.
Enemies affected by Mantra of Conviction inflict 45% less damage.
Increases Mantra strength so that enemies take 55% additional damage.
You and your allies have a 75% chance to be healed for 958 - 1064 Life when striking an enemy under the effects of Mantra of Conviction.
Enemies affected by Mantra of Conviction take 28 - 32 Holy damage per second.
Slows the movement of enemies within 20 yards by 48%.

Recite a Mantra that causes all enemies within 20 yards of you to take 20% additional damage. Lasts 120 seconds. Additional damage is doubled in the first 3 seconds. This is a Mantra. You can only have one Mantra active at a time.
Each impact explodes to deal 75 - 82 Holy damage around the target.
Teleport to the target location for the strike, and damage increases to 234% weapon damage per hit.
Reduces the cooldown of this ability to 16 seconds.
Increases the number of strikes made to 14 attacks.
Enemies hit by the barrage have a 55% chance per hit to be charmed or stunned for 3 seconds.
Dash rapidly between many nearby enemies 7 times striking for 130% weapon damage with every hit.

Imbue the ally with the essence of life. When the ally dies it has a 75% chance to be reborn after 4 seconds. In addition, the physical damage of the ally's basic attack is increased to 55 - 92 per swing.
Imbue the ally with the essence of fire. The ally gains the ability to fire kick for 46 - 77 Fire damage plus an additional 28 Fire damage per second for 2 seconds to all enemies in a straight line.

Imbue the ally with the essence of air. Every attack made by the ally has a 10% chance to generate 17 Spirit for you. In addition, the ally is surrounded in a torrent of wind that deals 32 - 49 physical damage per second to all nearby enemies.
Imbue the ally with the essence of water. The ally gains the ability to perform a wave attack that deals 65 - 109 physical damage and slows the movement of affected targets by 60% for 2 seconds.

Imbue the ally with the essence of earth. Maximum Life for you and the ally is increased by 50%. The ally also gains the ability to create a wave of earth, dealing 53 - 85 physical damage to a single enemy and forcing that enemy to attack the ally for 25 seconds.
Summon an elemental ally capable of engaging enemies in combat until it is destroyed. The ally deals 21 - 36 physical damage per swing.
Critical hits stun enemies for 5.0 seconds.
Increases damage of the initial impact to 116 - 175 Holy damage.
Shoot out bursts of energy in all directions that deal 170 - 202 Holy damage to nearby enemies.
Summon an ancient pillar that deals 100% weapon damage followed by an additional 800% weapon damage after 2 seconds.
Focuses the power of Light to smite all enemies in front of you for 57 - 85 Holy damage followed by an additional 36 - 57 Holy damage to all enemies in a line.
Transform your dart into a snake that has a 37% chance to clamp on to the target and stun it for 3 seconds.
Ignite the dart, allowing it to deal a full 369% weapon damage as Fire at once.
Gain 290 Mana every time a dart hits a target.
Shoot 8 darts at once that deal 60% weapon damage as Poison each.
Targets hit by a dart have their movement slowed by 60% for 6.0 seconds.
Shoot a deadly poison dart that deals 100% weapon damage as Poison and an additional 80% weapon damage per second as Poison over 2 seconds.
Mutate to yellow frogs that deal 248% weapon damage as Poison and confuse affected enemies for 2 seconds.
Mutate to red bullfrogs that explode for 341% weapon damage as Fire.
Hail a rain of toads down from the sky that deals 240% weapon damage per second as Poison to enemies in the area for 2 seconds.
Summon a giant toad that swallows enemies whole for up to 5 seconds, digesting for 90% of your weapon damage per second as Physical. This rune adds a 5 second cooldown to the skill.
Release a handful of toads that deal 155% weapon damage as Poison to enemies they come in contact with.
Your zombie dogs gain 65% of damage dealt as Life, half of which heals you.
Light your dogs on fire allowing them to burn nearby enemies for 70% of your weapon damage per second as Fire.
Upon death, your zombie dogs have a 85% chance of leaving behind a health globe.
70% of damage taken is absorbed by your zombie dogs.
Your summoned zombie dogs gain an infectious bite that deals 35% of your weapon damage per second as Poison for 3 seconds.
Summon 3 zombie dogs from the depths to fight by your side.
Killed targets have a 65% chance to produce a health globe.
Increases the damage done to 120% weapon damage per second as Physical.
Corpses fall from the sky dealing 70% weapon damage as Physical to nearby enemies.
Hands reach out from the ground slowing enemy movement by 50% and dealing 50% weapon damage per second as Physical for 8 seconds.
Modifies the spirit to do 320% weapon damage per second as Arcane over 1.9 seconds.
The spirit returns 45% of damage done as Life for you.
The spirit returns 100% of damage done as Mana for you.
If there are no targets left the spirit will linger for up to 15 seconds looking for new targets.
Slows the movement of haunted targets by 50%.

Haunt an enemy with a spirit dealing 500% weapon damage as Arcane over 15 seconds. If the target dies, the spirit will automatically haunt another nearby enemy. You may have up to 3 Haunt effects active at once.
Summon an explosive zombie dog that deals 262% weapon damage as Fire to all enemies within 9 yards.
Summons a stampede of three Zombie Bears, each dealing 112% weapon damage to enemies in the area.
If the charger kills a target, at the end of its path it will reappear as a new charger that deals 105% weapon damage as Poison. This effect can repeat up to 8 times.
Summon 8 zombie chargers that deal 165% weapon damage each.
The charger leaves behind a poisonous cloud that deals 135% weapon damage per second as Poison to enemies caught in it.
Call forth a reckless, suicidal zombie that deals 150% weapon damage as Poison to all enemies in its way.
Increases the damage taken by hexed targets to 90%.
Hexed targets bleed for 60% of your weapon damage per second.
The Fetish Shaman will periodically heal friendly targets for 5322 Life.
You turn into an Angry Chicken for up to 5 seconds that can explode for 300% weapon damage to all enemies within 12 yards.
Hexed targets explode when killed dealing 240% weapon damage as Poison to all enemies within 8 yards.
Summon a Fetish Shaman for 8 seconds that will hex enemies into chickens. Hexed enemies are unable to perform offensive actions and take 20% additional damage.
Summon paralyzing spiders that have a 60% chance to slow enemies movement by 60% with every attack.
Summon fire spiders that deal 41% weapon damage as Fire.
Summon widowmaker spiders that leech 70% of the damage they deal as Mana for you.
Summon a mother spider that births spiderlings dealing 103% weapon damage per second as Poison to enemies in the area. Lasts 22 seconds. You may only have one mother spider summoned at a time.
Summon jumping spiders that leap up to 25 yards to reach their target and attack for 38% weapon damage as Physical.
Summon 4 spiders to attack nearby enemies for 20% weapon damage as Physical.
Gain 50% increased movement speed for 4 seconds after cast.
Gain 170% additional armor for 8 seconds after casting Horrify.
Gain 282 Mana for every feared enemy.
Increases the radius of the effect to 26 yards.
Increases the duration of the fear to 12 seconds.
Don a spectral mask that horrifies all enemies within 12 yards, causing them to run in fear for 5 seconds.
Call forth a swirl of bats to damage nearby enemies for 358% weapon damage per second as Fire.
Summon fewer but larger bats that travel up to 40 yards and hit for 325% weapon damage per second as Fire.
35% of damage done by the bats is gained as Life.
Rapidly summon bats to seek out nearby targets for 210% weapon damage per second as Fire.
Enemies in the area are plagued. Damage is slow at first, but can increase over time to a maximum of 275% weapon damage per second as Poison.
A swarm of fiery bats burn enemies in front of you for 130% weapon damage per second as Fire.
Rather than exploding for area damage, each Firebomb can bounce up to 8 additional targets. Damage is reduced by 20% per bounce.
In addition to the base explosion, create a larger blast that deals an additional 104% weapon damage as Fire to all enemies within 28 yards.
Create a column of flame that spews fire at the closest enemy for 64% weapon damage as Fire. The column lasts 3 seconds.
Allows the skull to bounce up to 2 times. The first hit deals 182% weapon damage as Fire, and each bounce reduces the damage by 15%.
Leaves behind a pool of fire that deals 40% weapon damage per second as Fire for 3 seconds.
Lob an explosive skull that deals 130% weapon damage as Fire to all enemies within 8 yards.
Gain 16% of your maximum Life every second while Spirit Walk is active.
Enemies you walk through in spirit form take 180% weapon damage per second as Physical.
Gain 11% of your maximum Mana every second while Spirit Walk is active.
Increases the duration of Spirit Walk to 10.0 seconds.
When Spirit Walk ends, your physical form bursts for 135 - 249 Fire damage to all enemies within 10 yards.

Enter the spirit realm for 3 seconds. While in the spirit realm, your movement is unhindered. Your link to the spirit realm will end if you cast any spell or your physical body sustains 50% of your maximum health in damage.
Affected enemies also take 250% weapon damage as Physical.
Gain 4258 Life for every affected enemy.
Gain 1188 Mana for every affected enemy.
Increases duration of the effect to 65 seconds.
Reduces the movement speed of enemies by 60% for 11 seconds.
Feed on the life force of up to 5 nearby enemies within 15 yards. Gain 126 Attack for each affected enemy. This effect lasts 30 seconds.
Each sacrificed dog has a 70% chance to resurrect as a new zombie dog.
Increase all damage done by 40% for every sacrificed dog for 60 seconds.
Recover 792 Mana for each sacrificed dog.
Gain 3513 Life for each sacrificed dog.
Black inky goo shoots out and slows all affected enemies by 60% for 9 seconds.
All of your zombie dogs explode, each dealing 200% of your weapon damage as Physical to all enemies within 12 yards.
The Gargantuan's damage is increased to 210% of your weapon damage as Physical. The Gargantuan also gains the ability to the periodically slam enemies, stunning them for 3 seconds.

When the Gargantuan encounters an Elite enemy or is faced with 5 enemies nearby it enrages for 15 seconds gaining: 50% movement speed 50% attack speed 200% physical damage This effect cannot occur more than once every 120 seconds. Elite enemies include Champions, Rares, Bosses and other players.

The Gargantuan only lasts 20 seconds but is also more powerful. The Gargantuan's fists burn with fire, dealing an additional 155% of your weapon damage as Fire and knocking enemies back with every hit.
Gargantuan gains a Cleave ability allowing its attacks to hit multiple targets for 210% of your weapon damage as Physical.
The Gargantuan is surrounded in a poison cloud, dealing 45% of your weapon damage per second as Poison to nearby enemies.
Summon a large zombie follower to fight for you. The Gargantuan attacks for 30% of your weapon damage as Physical damage with every swing.
Targets killed by the Locust Swarm leave behind a disease cloud that deals 50% weapon damage per second as Poison to enemies in the cloud. The cloud lasts 3 seconds.
Ignite the locusts with fire causing them to deal 110% weapon damage per second as Fire.
Convert 40% of the damage done as Mana for you.
When the swarm jumps there is a 55% chance to jump to two targets instead of one.
Increase the duration of the swarm to 10 seconds.
Summon a plague of locusts to assault enemies, dealing 50% weapon damage per second as Poison for 3 seconds. The locusts will jump to additional nearby targets.
Summons a Spectre for 20 seconds that hovers over you conjuring spirit bolts at nearby enemies for 85% weapon damage as Physical.
Spirits return 40% of damage dealt as Life.
Spirits return 40% of damage dealt as Mana.
Every cast launches an additional 3 spirit bolts at nearby enemies other than the targeted enemy that each deal 60% weapon damage as Physical.
Summons a Spectre for 5 seconds that deals 72% weapon damage per second as Physical to all enemies within 10 yards.
Bombard a target with a spirit bolt that deals 125% weapon damage as Physical.
Spit a cloud of acid that inflict 256% weapon damage as Poison, followed by 51% weapon damage per second as Poison to enemies who remain in the area.
A corpse emerges from the ground and explodes for 325% weapon damage as Poison to enemies in the area.
Increases the duration of the acid pools to 10 seconds.
The initial splash is increased to 50 yards and deals 225% weapon damage as Poison.
The acid on the ground forms into a slime that irradiates nearby enemies for 48% weapon damage per second as Poison. The slime will survive for 18 seconds before dissipating.
Acid rains down dealing an initial 125% weapon damage as Poison, followed by 25% weapon damage per second to enemies who remain in the area.
Targets killed while confused have a 99% chance of spawning a zombie dog.
All enemies in the area take 80% additional damage.
Up to 10 monsters who aren't confused will be stunned for 5.0 seconds when the spell is first cast.
Amid the confusion a giant spirit rampages through enemies dealing 100% weapon damage per second as Physical to enemies it passes through.
Incite paranoia in enemies, causing some to fight for you for 8 seconds.
Enemies who die in the ritual area have a 75% chance to resurrect as a zombie dog.
Also increases the damage of all allies in the area by 40%.
Recover 1584 Mana per second while in the ritual area.
Increases the duration of the ritual to 48 seconds.
Also heals all allies in the area for 4.0% of their maximum Life per second.
Summon a fetish to begin a ritual dance that increases the attack, casting and movement speeds of all allies in the area by 15% for 20 seconds.
A tower of zombies falls over dealing 325% weapon damage as Physical to any enemies in the way.
Up to 3 zombies will emerge entirely from the ground and attack nearby enemies for 60% of your weapon damage per swing.
Zombies will slow the movement of enemies by 60% for 9 seconds.
Doubles the width of the wall. The line of zombies will attack for 60% weapon damage per second as Physical.
Zombies run out in all directions dealing 160% weapon damage as Physical to nearby enemies.
A line of zombies emerge from the ground, attacking nearby enemies for 40% weapon damage per second as Physical for 5 seconds.
Adds 2 Hunter Fetishes to the army. Hunter Fetishes shoot blowdarts at enemies dealing 63% of your weapon damage as Poison.
Each Fetish deals 205% weapon damage as Physical to any enemy near it as they appear.
Adds 2 dagger-wielders to the army and increases their damage to 44% of your weapon damage.
Adds 2 Fetish casters to the army. The casters breathe fire that deals 58% of your weapon damage as Fire in a cone in front of them.
Summon an army of Fetish creatures to fight by your side for 20 seconds. Dagger-wielding fetishes attack for 28% of your weapon damage as Physical.
Gain 10% of your maximum Mana whenever you are healed by a health globe.
Your Plague of Toads, Corpse Spiders and Firebats abilities do 20% more damage.
Maximum Mana is increased by 20%. Regenerate 2% of your maximum Mana per second. Mana is the fuel you use to cast offensive and defensive skills.
Gain 10% Attack for 10 seconds whenever you are healed by a health globe. This effect can stack up to 5 times.
50% of Mana costs are paid with Life. In addition, you regenerate 2% of your maximum Life per second.
You can have 4 Zombie Dogs out at once. The health of your Zombie Dogs and Gargantuan is increased by 60%.
All of your damage is increased by 20% but your Mana costs are increased by 30%.

Spirit spells return 200% of their Mana cost over 10 seconds.
Spirit spells are: Haunt Horrify Soul Harvest Spirit Barrage Spirit Walk
Anytime you have 4 or more skills on cooldown your mana regeneration is increased by 300%.
All your pets gain 100% of the benefit of your thorns items.
Reduce damage by 20% whenever you are below 50% of your maximum Life.
The cooldowns of your Fetish Army, Big Bad Voodoo and Hex abilities are reduced by 25%.
Missiles track the nearest target and damage is increased to 198% weapon damage as Arcane.
Damage increased to 242% weapon damage as Arcane.
Whenever Magic Missile hits a target you gain 14 Arcane Power.
Fires 8 missiles that each deal 55% weapon damage as Arcane.
Missiles have a 100% chance to pierce through their target and hit additional targets.

Launch a missile of magic energy causing 110% weapon damage as Arcane.
This is a Signature spell. Signature spells cost 1 less Arcane Power every time you gain a level.
If Frost Nova hits at least 5 targets, you gain 45% chance to critically hit for 12 seconds.
Enemies take 110% more damage while frozen or chilled by Frost Nova.
A frozen enemy that is killed has a 21% chance of exploding in a smaller Frost Nova dealing 90% weapon damage as Cold.
The Frost Nova no longer freezes enemies, but instead leaves behind a mist of frost for 8 seconds that deals 50% weapon damage per second as Cold to enemies standing in it.
An explosion of ice freezes nearby enemies for 4 seconds and deals 75% weapon damage as Cold.
Attacks have a 55% chance to create a Frost Nova on the attacker dealing 115% weapon damage as Cold.
Attackers take 42% weapon damage as Cold and are chilled for 5.5 seconds.
Whenever you are struck by a melee attack the bonus armor granted by Ice Armor is increased by 85% for 10 seconds. This effect can stack up to 3 times.
Lower the temperature of the air around you. Nearby enemies are chilled, slowing their movement and attack speed, for 3.0 seconds.
A whirling storm of ice builds around you that deals 57% weapon damage per second as Cold for 16 seconds after casting Ice Armor.

Surround yourself in a barrier of ice that increases armor by 50% and causes 10% weapon damage as Cold to melee attackers, chilling them for 2 seconds. Lasts 120 seconds.
This is an Armor spell. Only one Armor spell can be active at a time.
Slain enemies have a 100% chance to explode dealing 450% weapon damage as Lightning to every enemy within 10 yards.
Casts out bolts of fire that each deal 195% weapon damage as Fire.
Every target hit by a pulse restores 7 Arcane Power.
Turn the bolts into a floating orb of static lightning that drifts directly forward, zapping up to 5 nearby enemies for 46% weapon damage as Lightning.
Merge the bolts in a a single giant orb that oscillates forward dealing 95% weapon damage as Lightning to everything it hits with a 100% chance to pierce through enemies.

Release a pulse of 3 unpredictable charges of electricity that deal 95% weapon damage as Lightning to enemies they hit.
This is a Signature spell. Signature spells cost 1 less Arcane Power every time you gain a level.
Increases the distance enemies are knocked back and stuns all affected enemies for 5.0 seconds.
Increases damage to 396% weapon damage as Physical, but reduces knockback.
Reduce casting cost to 11 Arcane Power and cooldown is reduced to 8 seconds.
Enemies hit have a 100% chance to cause a smaller Wave of Force that deals 90% weapon damage as Physical and knocks back enemies caught in its wake.
Enemies caught in the wave have a 70% chance to randomly teleport to somewhere else nearby.
Explode a wave of pure energy that repels projectiles and knocks back nearby enemies. This also slows the movement of enemies by 50% and deals 180% weapon damage as Physical.
Whenever the blades do critical damage, you are healed 100% of the damage caused.
Enemies hit by the blade will bleed for an additional 45% weapon damage done over 3 seconds.
Every enemy hit grants 7 Arcane Power.
Extends the blades out to reach everything within 20 yards dealing 72% weapon damage.
Hits have a 45% chance to cause knockback and slow the movement of enemies by 60% for 2 seconds.

Summon a spectral blade that strikes all enemies in your path 3 times causing 35% weapon damage with each hit.
This is a Signature spell. Signature spells cost 1 less Arcane Power every time you gain a level.
Critical hits with this skill cause an explosion of 5 charged bolts in random directions, dealing 210% weapon damage as Lightning to any targets hit.
Creates a streak of lightning that pierces targets, hitting all enemies in its path for 180% weapon damage as Lightning.
Gain 7 Arcane Power for every target hit by Electrocute.
Increases the maximum number of jumps to 10 enemies.
Blast a cone of lightning that causes 165% weapon damage as Lightning to all affected targets.

Lightning arcs from your fingertips towards an enemy dealing 150% weapon damage as Lightning. The lightning can jump, hitting up to 2 enemies. Damage is reduced by 30% for each jump.
This is a Signature spell. Signature spells cost 1 less Arcane Power every time you gain a level.
Melee hits recover 45% of damage caused as Life.
Melee attacks burn enemies with fire for 70% of weapon damage for 3 seconds.
Melee attacks cause lightning to arc to 8 nearby enemies dealing 18% of weapon damage as Lightning damage.
Increases damage bonus to 34% physical damage, and gives a 45% chance to knock back any enemies hit.
Imbue your weapon with magical energy granting it 20% increased physical damage. Can only affect melee weapons. Lasts 60 seconds.
The orb will pierce through targets, damaging any enemy it passes through dealing 256% weapon damage as Arcane.
Increase the potency of the explosion to deal 495% weapon damage as Arcane.
Reduce casting cost to 21 Arcane Power.
Modify the orb to deal 398% weapon damage as Arcane to all enemies within 16 yards.
Create 4 Arcane Orb(s) that orbit you, exploding for 270% weapon damage as Arcane when enemies get close.
Hurl an orb of pure energy that explodes when it hits, dealing 225% weapon damage as Arcane to all enemies within 10 yards.
When Diamond Skin wears off, diamond shards will explode in all directions dealing 50% weapon damage as Physical to enemies nearby.
Reflects 160% of damage absorbed back at the attacker.
Reduce Arcane Power cost of all spells by 14 while Diamond Skin is active.
Increase the maximum absorption amount to 6919 damage.
Transform your skin to diamond for 5 seconds absorbing up to 2661 damage from incoming attacks.
Twister no longer travels but spins in place dealing 84% weapon damage per second as Arcane to everything caught within it.
Increase damage to 132% weapon damage per second as Arcane.
Reduce casting cost to 14 Arcane Power.
When two twisters touch they merge into a tornado with an increased area of effect that causes 100% weapon damage per second as Arcane.

Casting Energy Twister grants you a Wind Charge. You can store up to 5 Wind Charges at a time. Casting a Signature spell releases all Wind Charges as a giant Energy Twister that deals 25% weapon damage per Wind Charge.
Unleash a twister of pure energy that deals 60% weapon damage per second Arcane to everything caught within it.
Enemies killed by the beam have a 35% chance to explode causing 200% weapon damage as Arcane to all enemies within 8 yards.
Damage increases slowly over time to inflict a maximum of 330% weapon damage per second as Arcane.
When casting the beam you become charged with energy that spits out at nearby enemies doing 80% weapon damage as Arcane.
Increase the width of the beam allowing it to hit more enemies for 195% weapon damage per second as Arcane.
The beam fractures into a short ranged cone causing 255% weapon damage per second as Arcane.
Thrust a beam of pure energy forward dealing 150% weapon damage per second as Arcane and disintegrating enemies it kills.
Whenever you cast a spell that critically hits, you also shock a nearby enemy for 319% weapon damage as Lightning.
Increase the damage of the shock to 280% weapon damage as Lightning.
Reduce the cost of all abilities by 7 Arcane Power while Storm Armor is active.
Increase your movement speed by 20% for 5 seconds whenever you are hit by melee or ranged attack.
Whenever you are hit you are enveloped with a lightning shield for 8 seconds that shocks nearby enemies for 153% weapon damage as Lightning.

Bathe yourself in electrical energy, shocking ranged and melee attackers for 127% weapon damage as Lightning. Lasts 120 seconds.
This is an Armor spell. Only one Armor spell can be active at a time.
8 consecutive explosions cascade off you that each cause 91% weapon damage as Physical.
An energy explosion fires immediately for 309% weapon damage as Physical.
Reduces the casting cost to 24 Arcane Power.
Increase the explosion radius to 18 yards for 309% weapon damage as Physical.
The blast detonates from the point it was originally cast after 2 seconds for 372% weapon damage as Physical.
Gather an infusion of energy around you that explodes after 2 seconds, causing 182% weapon damage as Physical to any nearby enemies.
When an image is destroyed it explodes, doing 135% weapon damage as Physical and has 50% chance to stun enemies it hits for 5 seconds.
Spells the images cast will do 70% of the damage as your own.
The duration of the images is increased to 31 seconds and increases the Life of your images to 60% of your Life.
Summons 6 illusionary duplicates that have 25% of your Life each.
Increases the Life of your images to 125% of your Life.
Summon 2 illusionary duplicates of yourself that last for 15 seconds and have 25% of your Life. The images may cast some of the same spells as you, but those spells deal no damage.
Time is sped up for any friendly heroes standing in the bubble, increasing attack and cast speed by 140%.
Enemies caught in the bubble of warped time take 140% more damage.
Slow Time effects cling to enemies for 14 seconds after they have left the bubble.
Reduces the size of the Slow Time bubble to 10 yards, but increases the effect, slowing movement and attack speed of enemies by 60% while inside the bubble.
Invoke a bubble of warped time and space for 10 seconds, slowing the movement and attack speed of enemies by 35%. This bubble also slows the movement of enemy projectiles by 90%.
After casting Teleport there is a 2.0 second delay before the cooldown begins.
Casts a low power Wave of Force on arrival dealing 145% weapon damage as Physical to all enemies nearby.
Casting Teleport again within 8 seconds will instantly bring you back to your original location.
Summon 2 mirror images for 15 seconds on arrival.
For 16 seconds after you appear you will take 25% less damage.
Teleport through the ether to the selected location up to 35 yards away.
Summon Arcane Hydras that spit Arcane Orbs which explode on impact causing 48% weapon damage as Arcane to enemies near the explosion.
Summon Frost Hydras that breathe a short range cone of frost causing 64% weapon damage per second as Cold to all enemies in the cone.
Summon one Mammoth Hydra that breathes a wall of flame at nearby enemies dealing 82% weapon damage per second as Fire to enemies caught in the burning ground.
Summon Lightning Hydras that shock enemies for 88% weapon damage as Lightning.
Summon Poison Breathing Hydras that leave a pool of acid causing 32% weapon damage per second as Poison to enemies who remain in the pool.
Summon a multi-headed Hydra for 9 seconds that attacks enemies with bolts of fire dealing 40% weapon damage as Fire per attack.
Enemies who die leave a patch of ice on the ground that causes 385% weapon damage per second as Cold to enemies moving through it.
Damage increases slowly over 1.5 seconds to inflict a maximum of 715% weapon damage per second as Cold.
Reduce casting cost to 3 Arcane Power per second.
Create a swirling storm of sleet dealing 150% weapon damage per second as Cold to all enemies caught within it.
Increase enemy slow amount to 50% for 8.5 seconds, but damage is reduced to 220% weapon damage per second as Cold.
Project a beam of frozen ice that blasts 275% weapon damage per second as Cold to the first enemy it hits, slowing the target's movement by 40% and attack speed by 30% for 5 seconds.
Also increases your Precision by 40% while Energy Armor is active.
Increases all of your resistances by 180% while Energy Armor is active.
Gain 7 Arcane Power whenever you are hit by an ranged or melee attack.
Rather than reducing your maximum Arcane Power, it is increased by 40 while Energy Armor is active.
While Energy Armor is active, incoming attacks that would deal more than 26% of your maximum Life are reduced to deal 26% of your maximum Life instead.

Focus your energies, increasing your Defense by 20% but lowers your maximum Arcane Power by 20. Lasts 120 seconds.
This is an Armor spell. Only one Armor spell can be active at a time.
Unleash the torrent beyond your control. You can no longer direct where the projectiles go but their damage is increased to 365% weapon damage per second as Arcane.
Targets hit by Arcane Torrent become Disrupted for 6 seconds, causing them to take 120% additional damage from any attacks that deal Arcane damage.
Every missile hit has a 8% chance to leave behind a Power Stone that grants Arcane Power when picked up.
Enemies killed by Arcane Torrent have a 95% chance to fire a new missile at a nearby enemy dealing 135% weapon damage as Arcane.

Instead of firing projectiles, lay Arcane mines that arm after 1 second. These mines explode when an enemy approaches, dealing 220% weapon damage as Arcane. Enemies caught in the explosion have their movement and attack speeds reduced by 30% for 3 seconds.
Hurl a barrage of arcane projectiles that deal 200% weapon damage per second as Arcane to all enemies near the impact location.
If the initial impact critically hits any targets the molten fire duration is increased to 18 seconds.
Increase the damage of the meteor impact to 990% weapon damage as Fire and the molten fire to 143% weapon damage as Fire over 3 seconds.
Reduce casting cost to 39 Arcane Power.
Unleash a volley of 14 smaller meteors that each strike for 292% weapon damage as Fire.

Transforms the meteor to ice that deals 630% weapon damage as Cold. The impact site is covered in a freezing mist that deals 91% weapon damage as Cold and slows the movement of enemies by 60% over 3 seconds.

Summon an immense meteor that plummets from the sky causing 450% weapon damage as Fire to all enemies it crashes into. The ground it hits is scorched with molten fire that deals 65% weapon damage as Fire over 3 seconds.
Enemies caught in the storm have a 52% chance to be frozen for 3 seconds and the critical strike chance with Blizzard is increased by 80%.
Increase the duration of the Blizzard to 10 seconds.
Reduce the casting cost to 24 Arcane Power.
Increase the size of the Blizzard to cover 22 yards, and deal 300% weapon damage per second as Cold.
After the Blizzard ends, cover the ground in a low lying mist for 6.0 seconds that slows any enemies who enters it.
Call down shards of ice to pelt an area dealing 125% weapon damage per second as Cold for 3 seconds.
While you are below 25% Life the Familiar will absorb up to 8 attacks directed at you. If it absorbs all its attacks it will disintegrate.
Increase damage of all attacks by 40% while Familiar is active.
While the Familiar is active you regenerate 270 Arcane Power per minute.
Familiar's projectiles explode on impact dealing 13% weapon damage as Arcane to all enemies within 10 yards.
Familiar's projectiles have a 100% chance to pierce through enemies.
Summon a companion that will attack your targets for 15% weapon damage as Arcane. This companion cannot be targeted or damaged by enemies. Pet lasts 60 seconds.
An explosion errupts when you transform causing 800% weapon damage as Arcane to all enemies within 15 yards.
Increase damage of all Archon abilities by 120%.
Decrease the cooldown of Archon to 80 seconds.
Archon form can now cast a Slow Time that lasts for 20 seconds.
Archon form can now cast Teleport with a cooldown of 3 seconds.

Transform into a being of pure arcane energy for 15 seconds. While in Archon form your normal abilities are replaced by powerful Archon abilities, and your armor and resistances are increased by 40%. Every enemy killed while in Archon form adds 1 second to the duration of Archon.
Gain 30 Arcane Power whenever you are healed by a health globe.
Whenever you deal Arcane damage, enemies are slowed by 24% for 2 seconds.
Increases all damage done by 20% but decreases armor and resistances by 10%.

Every time you cast a Signature spell, you gain 5 Arcane Power.
The following skills are Signature spells: Magic Missile Shock Pulse Spectral Blade Electrocute
Increases the damage of your basic wand attack by 100%. Successful attacks with a wand generate 15 Arcane Power and heal you for 1% of your maximum Life.
Increases your maximum Arcane Power by 20 and Arcane Power regeneration by 2 per second.
Whenever you suffer more than 15% of your Life in a single hit the cooldown on your Mirror Image and Teleport abilities is automatically reset.

Increases the duration of your armor spells by 120 seconds. As long as an Armor spell is active, you gain 32 Life per second.
The following skills are improved: Energy Armor Ice Armor Storm Armor

When you deal damage with a Signature spell you gain a Flash of Insight. After 8 Flashes of Insight your next non-Signature spell deals 50% additional damage. You cannot gain a Flash of Insight more than once every 1.5 seconds.
The following skills are Signature spells: Magic Missile Shock Pulse Spectral Blade Electrocute
When reduced below 20% Life release a shockwave that knocks all enemies back. This effect cannot occur more than once every 60 seconds.
